about_the_game:
ENDO Original Soundtrack by Dez Boyle, an in-game art book and 4K resolution uncompressed wallpapers for desktop and mobile. You can find the interactive art book in the title screen featuring exclusive behind-the-scenes concept art and sketches from the development of ENDO.

Your purchase greatly helps support my career as a game developer.

Soundtrack and Wallpapers will be downloaded to :
PC: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\music\ENDO Soundtrack + Wallpapers"
Mac: "/Users/USERNAME/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/music/ENDO Soundtrack + Wallpapers"
Linux: "/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/music$/ENDO Soundtrack + Wallpapers"

Peace and much love,
Dez
